title: Tangle Master 3D
description: Just untangle them all, relax your brain and have "quadruple" fun!
descriptionHTML: Just untangle them all, relax your brain and have "quadruple" fun!
summary: Relax and Untangle!
developerAddress: Esentepe Mahallesi, Talatpaşa Caddesi, No: 5-6 Şişli, İstanbul  34394
recentChanges: - Performance Improvements
comments: The game is really fun. There are way too many ads but it's a free game so I'm willing to accept them. I like that you can also watch a video for 3 extra moves if needed, no strings attached, no payments, no coin cost. The only real issue I have is occasionally it won't let me place a rope in the end slot which then means I have to fiddle with the order and can mean I lose the level. It's not always it's just a little annoying, even when I position it carefully it happens.

TOO MANY ADS. NOT WORTH IT. Gave it 5 stars yesterday...big mistake. One star is all it really deserves. It is fun but after each 'level' (which takes anywhere from 30 sec to 2 min)you are BOMBARDED with 2 or more BLARING ADS lasting more than the play itself!! I am uninstalling this game. Actually, all-in-all, not enjoyable at all. Trust me when I tell you not to take up space on your phone. (BTW, developed in Turkey, not the USA) It would be more enjoyable to pick your nose.

At first I was enjoying it, but soon I founded it very addictive and annoying at the same time, due to the very short time they give you to solve the difficult ones, it's taking me about 20 attempts to solve just one , very stressful and it's starting to make me mad, plus it has a lot of long adds I'm uninstalling it.

While I am enjoying this game as a way to relax in between moments, I have found no use for the coins collected. You use them to purchase the visual mods but you can also win these. I'd adjust it to a leveling system or provide MANY more options for purchase. With the adds, while frequent, I have seen much worse. My only issue with them is that when I first started playing most would automatically be muted. As I often listen to audiobooks this was a great selling point. Please bring this back.

At first the game was enjoyable. Nice way to spend a few seconds. But the tangles are repetitive. With 3 or 4 ropes and only 5 spaces to use to untangle, there aren't a lot of options. I'm up to level 450. I have over 165,000 coins. I still have no idea what to do with them. And, as other reviews as said, the ratio of ad watching to actual game play is way out of balance. An adult themed pregnant wife, cheating husband game app ad when children could be playing is inappropriate.

title: Find Friends, Meet New People, Cuddle Voice Chat
description:
Cuddle like HouseParty and ClubHouse -Free Group Voice Chat Room App ❤️: Random Live Chat with Strangers; Seek, Date & Find Friends; Sing, Karaoke & Play Music; ASMR Sleep & Join HQ trivia; Grow Fans & Make Money! Have Fun with Friends at the House party Online!

💕Cuddle is NOT a dating app, even though lots of Cuddle users chat with strangers, find friends, participate in online marriage ceremonies, become real couples, and even find their soulmate. 

📻Cuddle is NOT a radio app, even though we have lots of DJs that host live shows, play music and sing every day, all of whom engage and interact with their listeners and earn money!

🗣️Cuddle is NOT a walkie talkie, even though people call in and talk with each other about all kinds of topics while having fun in the community. 

🎙️Cuddle is a group voice chat room app, where people can enjoy anything they want to kill time and to kill boredom.

Join Cuddle, the leading group voice chat and house party app with over 100k+ Cuddlers online. Listen to live streams, chat with strangers, and find friends all around the world. Best of all it’s anonymous and free to chat and call. Share your thoughts, play music, join trivia, find someone to match with and love, connect to people, find friends, host games, and earn money. Everything is available 24/7. It’s more fun than walkie talkies and radio. An audio version of House party, Twitch and an interactive version of Discord! No matter where you are, you’ll never be lonely again.

What do Cuddlers love about Cuddle?
🆓Join a free random chat room, where you can send messages/emojis, call in to talk and interact directly with a DJ, and send them virtual gifts to show your love and appreciation.
🎖️Climb the leaderboards, with daily, weekly, and monthly DJ/Fan rankings, and you’ll turn into a famous superstar in Cuddle.
🏆Participate in different events to win avatars, badges, and entrance effects, which will all be sent directly to your in-app bag.
👩🏻‍🎤Follow your favorite DJ. Stay connected through direct messages or whisper (private message) your secrets in live rooms.
💞Select single-host live show, multi-host chat room, Dating Game Theme, or password-protected Private Rooms, to just talk to random strangers, find friends, play dating games to find your romantic date and meetup.
🎮Choose topics such as Social Dating, Just Chatting, Relationships, Music, Comedy, Movies/TV, Anime, ASMR/Sleep, Video Game, Horoscope/Astrology, Trivia Games, and Just Talk.
💃🏻Add voice labels to your favorite DJ: Sexy, Cute, Romantic, Friendly, Sweet, Funny, Warm 
🤼‍♀️DJs can invite other DJs to BATTLE using 1V1 PK function.

Why do Cuddlers love Cuddle?
🎧Listen, Chat, and Find Friends
- Are you bored? Listen to hundreds of casual, and friendly group chats with topics ranging from Music, Singing, karaoke, Love, Games, Relationships, Friends, ASMR, Horoscope, Trivia.
- Don’t feel like putting on makeup? It doesn’t matter. We’re different from Caffeine, Bigo Live, Live.me or Periscope, because you can meet new friends without showing your face. Enjoy a live, real, fun, easy, and safe chat.
- Feeling lonely? We have an active community and social club, and tons of talented, singers, Anime and Manga lovers, gamers, comedians.
- Having trouble falling asleep? Cuddle has many sleep casts to help relax you before you go to bed.

🎙️Broadcast, Live and Start the House party
- Launch a chat room with one click. It’s free to use! Broadcast using your voice to connect with audiences. 
- Can you sing? Perform karaoke, or even do a duet with other users. Love music? Play your own music. Remember to interact with your live audience during the house party.
- Share your life, gain fans, receive gifts, and live in the moment!

No matter where you are, with Cuddle, you’ll never be lonely! Enjoy the new era of radio and walkie talkie! Download Cuddle and have fun with new friends at the house party online together!

title: Kids Animal Slide Puzzle 15
description:
From the award winning Puzzle game developer...

Kids Animal Slide Puzzles is a modern version of the traditional plastic sliding puzzle game that you may have played as a child. It involves rearranging square tiles to form a complete picture by sliding the tiles into the correct place. You may know the game as the 15-puzzle, Gem Puzzle, Boss Puzzle, Game of Fifteen, Mosaic Game, or Mystic Squares.

Kids Animal Slide Puzzles has:
- intuitive touch interface and high quality graphics that look stunning on High Definition (HD) and retina displays of both tablets and smart phones
- increasing levels of difficulty beginning with the classic 3x3 and 4x4 board sizes and working all the way up to 12x12.
- select optional numerical indicators on the tiles to help in placement or play in pure picture mode for a greater challenge
- a preview of the final picture is shown next to the puzzle
- complete the puzzle with minimal moves to be awarded one, two or three stars
- the tiles don’t stick or jam (unlike the old plastic equivalent)
- suitable for all ages from 5 to adult
- fun and realistic sound effects on successful completion of each puzzle
- covers most common wild animals that children love as well as some lesser known ones. For example cow, cheetah, sea lion, cat, horse, tiger, crocodile, lion, chimpanzee, hippopotamus, sheep and many others. 
- no advertising

Kids Animal Slide Puzzles comes with a selection of free games that can be easily upgraded through a single low cost in-app purchase to enable all puzzles. By upgrading from the Free App to the full version you’ll also be entitled to all additional puzzles and features added in future releases.

We hope you enjoy playing what we believe is one of best and most realistic electronic slide puzzle games on the market. Check out our other puzzle games and acclaimed kids educational apps at http://espacepublishing.com or follow us on Facebook for the scoop on new app releases and free giveaways at http://facebook.com/espacepublishing.

title: Asana: Your work manager
description:
Asana is the work manager for teams. But better. From the small stuff to the big picture, Asana organizes work so teams are clear what to do, why it matters, and how to get it done.

✔ TAKE THE GUESSWORK OUT OF WORK
See who is doing what and by when across the whole team:
Coordinate plans, projects, and tasks in one shared space
Switch between list, kanban board, and calendar views
Organize and assign tasks; set due dates
Attach files to tasks so relevant info is easy to find

✔ GET THE WHOLE PICTURE—EVEN ON THE GO
Keep an eye on progress no matter where you are:
Instantly see if projects are on track, at risk, or off track—and why
Post status updates, or request updates from project owners
Drill down into tasks for more information

✔ PUSH WORK ALONG...WITHOUT GETTING PUSHY
Make sure nothing falls through the cracks:
Clarify if tasks are high, medium, or low priority
Approve work or mark tasks for approval
Set tasks as milestones to establish critical checkpoints
Get notified when tasks are completed, overdue, and more

✔ ASANA MOBILE + WEB = YOUR A-TEAM
Work efficiently whether you’re at the office or on the go: 
Automatically transcribe voice memos to tasks
Convert photos of whiteboards, charts, or diagrams to tasks
Instantly sync work between the app and web
Work offline without worrying about losing your data

Join more than 75,000 organizations and millions of users worldwide who trust Asana to stay organized and in control of their work. Download the Asana app now.

By downloading Asana, you agree to our Terms of Service, which you can find at https://asana.com/terms

comments: Ever since the update this app sucks outloud. The dashboard in the widget is useless, nothing shows up there. Things that were there before the update are gone. I have to check the calendar at best to find tasks, at worst I have to refer to the email I was sent. Making the app effectively useless. I can just use a calendar app. That way I can see the info i need at a glance without having to dig for it. UPDATE. I don't see ANY of my projects at all in the app. Just deleted the app. Thanks!!

Lot of issues of login. Very stupid idea login by email. You cannot login into your asana account without using the "magic email". There is no option to enter in your password and email combination. Since my email accounts are both Gmail I'd be obliged to logout and login back in each time or create a new account and lose my work. Is it really asking too ...

Chats in a task will better if it's like in WhatsApp or any similar apps. It's familiar and have all the details in the current chats in asana. Now it feels like a lost of msgs.. It's difficult to swiftly check who said wat inside a chat.. Improvement reuiqred..

Update 11.10.2020: After update not even start. After 2 weeks of use: Great app for task a partially also for project management in smaller teams and/or IT companies with agile approach. Not so easily usable for waterfall approach.
It refused to recognize the password I just created and wrote down. Then when I did log in the first time the profile creation just hits a dead end. Not worth wasting any more time on it...

title: Xbox
description:
The all new Xbox app keeps you connected to the fun with your friends, games, and console from your phone or tablet while on the go. 

Easily share game clips and screenshots from your console to favorite gaming & social networks. Friends and parties follow you with voice and text chat, even if they’re on console or PC. Get notifications for new game invites, messages, and more. Plus, now play games from your console straight to your phone over the internet. The free Xbox app is the best way to stay in the game—wherever you like to play.

-Download the new Xbox app and stay connected to friends & games 
-Easily share game clips & screenshots to your favorite social networks 
-Use integrated voice and text chat with friends on console or PC 
-Play games from your console straight to your phone over the internet*
-Get notifications for new game invites, party chat messages and more

*Requires supported phones or tablets (mobile data charges may apply) and supported Bluetooth controller, with supported games. Xbox One or Xbox Series X must be turned on or in Instant-On mode. Learn more at xbox.com/mobile-app. Online console multiplayer (including via Xbox remote play) requires Xbox Game Pass Ultimate or Xbox Live Gold, memberships sold separately.

Please refer to Microsoft’s EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft’s gaming applications on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.xbox.com/help/subscriptions-billing/manage-subscriptions/microsoft-software-license-terms-mobile-gaming

You also give to third parties, without charge, any patent rights needed for their products, technologies and services to use or interface with any specific parts of a Microsoft software or service that includes the feedback. You will not give feedback that is subject to a license that requires Microsoft to license its software or documentation to third parties because we include your feedback in them. These rights survive this agreement.

comments: Used to look decent and work great, now it looks great and works decent. The new UI looks very clean and new, but it's difficult to recommend anymore because as of the new update, the Xbox remote function no longer works (almost) at all. If they fix it, then its basically 5 out of 5 stars and I'll update it. Until then, I don't have much use for it now except text friends on Xbox every now and then, and the occasional game clip

The previous version of this app was wonderful. It had everything in easy to find places and was only missing the option to change your gamertag. In the current version, however, that is no longer true. The biggest two things that I can no longer find are where to access account settings, such as pfp and email, and I can't find my achievements anywhere. Nothing was even added to make up for this. They just removed some features and changed the app layout.

With the latest update, the ui and simplicity of everything is nice; however, most of the main features that made the previous updates so great, were removed. The main purpose I downloaded this app, was to easily have access to my profile and check my achievements. Now that you can no longer do neither (other than being online/offline), it's useless to me. Disappointed.

I do not like the latest update. It looks nice but the features I used previously are no longer available. Also, if I click on a friend's name from chat it gives me several options like delete, favorite, and unblock even if they aren't blocked. I clicked on unblock because I thought it was very weird that I had blocked my friend and thought I just have done it in accident. Clicking unblock actually blocked her. Luckily we figured that out pretty quickly. I wish I could uninstall the update.

The removal of many features such as the store, redeeming codes, changing custom gamerpics and so on was an awful idea. I found the app difficult at times and slow but it worked for the most part, now it looks nice but key features for me personally are all gone. Hopefully they add these things back in the very near future as well as a bunch of other things. The new UI looks good for sure, but certainly wasn't worth losing so much for. Until then, 1 star is all it deserves in my opinion.

title: Wolf Wallpaper
description:
The gray wolf (Canis lupus) also known as the timber wolf or western wolf is a canid native to the wilderness and remote areas of North America, Eurasia, and northern, eastern and western Africa. It is the largest extant member of its family, with males averaging 43–45 kg and females 36–38.5 kg. Like the red wolf, it is distinguished from other Canis species by its larger size and less pointed features, particularly on the ears and muzzle. Its winter fur is long and bushy, and predominantly a mottled gray in color, although nearly pure white, red, or brown to black also occur. As of 2005, 37 subspecies of C. lupus are recognised by MSW3. The nominate subspecies is the Eurasian wolf (Canis lupus lupus), also known as the common wolf.

The gray wolf is the most specialised member of the genus Canis, as demonstrated by its morphological adaptations to hunting large prey, its more gregarious nature and its highly advanced expressive behavior. It is nonetheless closely related enough to smaller Canis species, such as the eastern wolf, coyote and golden jackal to produce fertile hybrids. Its closest relative is the domestic dog, with which it shared a common European ancestor which likely diverged 14,900 years ago. It is the only species of Canis to have a range encompassing both the Old and New Worlds and originated in Eurasia during the Pleistocene, colonizing North America on at least three separate occasions during the Rancholabrean. It is a social animal, travelling in nuclear families consisting of a mated pair, accompanied by the pair's adult offspring. The gray wolf is typically an apex predator throughout its range, with only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it. It feeds primarily on large ungulates, though it also eats smaller animals, livestock, carrion, and garbage.

wolf wallpapers for your phone or tablet!
- This feature can tap on the screen and make the image immediately.
- It has support for landscape mode and portrait mode switching screen.
- Beautiful background free and fun are waiting for you!
Instructions to install:
Home - Menu -> Wallpapers.
Movements and flashing light keeps changing with time.
- You can choose from several different styles.
- HD Graphics and Open GL
- Battery usage optimization.
- Compatible with 99% of mobile phone accessories.
- wolf pictures fully supports landscape and look amazing on tablet devices.
Please contact us if you have any problems with our application.
* Android is a trademark of Google.

title: Verizon Call Filter
description:
Your phone is your door to the world, and you shouldn't open it for just anyone. With Call Filter, you can screen incoming calls, auto-block spam and report any unwanted numbers. Or, upgrade to Call Filter Plus with Caller ID for added security. Put a name to the unknown numbers, make your own personal block list, and even assess the risk level of incoming calls. Enroll today and start answering with confidence.

 

Key Features:

• Get real-time alerts on your incoming call screen so you can better avoid spam calls

• Automatically send spam callers to voicemail with the spam filter

• Report a number as spam so you can help improve our algorithm

• See each spam call’s level of risk so that you can learn more about the caller

• Manage other unwanted calls with a personal spam and block list

• Block all incoming calls from international numbers

• Search our spam database to see if a number has already been identified as spam

• Identify unknown numbers by name on the incoming call screen, call log and eligible messaging apps, even if the caller is not saved to your contacts

• Seamlessly update your contacts with newly identified numbers

 

Eligible customers get a 10-day trial of Call Filter Plus. Customers can choose to enroll in Call Filter to get just the basics (spam detection, blocking and reporting) for free, or subscribe to Call Filter Plus for all that and more for $2.99 per month, per line. Accounts with 3 or more eligible lines can subscribe to Call Filter Plus (Multi-line) for $7.99/mo by logging in to My Verizon. If you choose to enroll in Call Filter or Call Filter Plus via the app, the spam filter will be automatically set to block high-risk spam callers, but you can change your block settings at any time. Data charges apply.

 

Please reference https://www.vzw.com/support/how-to-use-call-filter/ and https://www.vzw.com/support/call-filter-faqs/ for step-by-step instructions on how to use the app and answers to frequently asked questions. For additional details on Call Filter and Call Filter Plus, please see https://www.verizonwireless.com/solutions-and-services/call-filter/.
